# gemoji [![Build Status][travis-badge]][travis] [![Coverage Status][codecov-badge]][codecov]

GitHub emoji: gemoji.  Information on emoji such as description, names,
and tags.

## Installation

[npm][]:

```bash
npm install gemoji
```

## Usage

```javascript
var gemoji = require('gemoji');

gemoji.name['cat'];
```

Yields:

```json
{
  "description": "cat face",
  "names": ["cat"],
  "tags": ["pet"],
  "name": "cat",
  "emoji": "üê±"
}
```

### By unicode emoji

```javascript
gemoji.unicode['üê∂'];
```

Yields:

```json
{
  "description": "dog face",
  "names": ["dog"],
  "tags": ["pet"],
  "name": "dog",
  "emoji": "üê∂"
}
```

...and...

```javascript
gemoji.unicode['\uD83D\uDCA9'];
```

Yields:

```json
{
  "description": "pile of poo",
  "names": ["hankey", "poop", "shit"],
  "tags": ["crap"],
  "name": "hankey",
  "emoji": "üí©"
}
```

## Supported Gemoji

See [support.md][support].

## Data

The emoji list is crawled from [github/gemoji][gh] and later processed
for relevant information.  See its [license][gh-license] for more
information.

No images are included in this repository‚Äîthe copyrighted material may or may
not be available on the users computer.
